m_szDocTitle: Audi To Lead Hydrogen Fuel Cell Technology For The Volkswagen Group - Overdrive
m_szDocSumamry: Overdrive Audi to lead hydrogen fuel cell technology for the Volkswagen group   Audi to lead hydrogen fuel cell technology for the Volkswagen group 14 Mar 2016 /  Team OD Staff The Volkswagen group has been in the eye of the storm with the recent diesel emission scandal. However, the company is making amends and is using one of its flagship brands, Audi to lead its hydrogen fuel cell efforts. Despite electric vehicles gaining traction in International markets, Audi’s new development chief Stefan Knirsch feels that hydrogen fuel cell vehicles are the way forward.
